metadata.title: CVE-2024-8388 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple prompts and panels from both Firefox and the Android OS could beused to obscure the notification announcing the transition to fullscreenmode after the fix for CVE-2023-6870 in Firefox 121. This could lead tospoofing the browser UI if the sudden appearance of the prompt distractedthe user from noticing the visual transition happening behind the prompt.These notifications now use the Android Toast feature.*This bug only affects Firefox on Android. Other operating systems areunaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 130.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
